sentences.en: Although I have afflicted you, O Judah, I will afflict you no more.
sentences.cn: 犹大阿, 我虽然使你受苦, 却不再使你受苦.

sentences.en: And she began to afflict him, and his strength left him.
sentences.cn: 于是大利拉起首克制他, 他的力气离开了他.

sentences.en: But animals are generally not susceptible to the diseases that afflict humans.
sentences.cn: 但是动物对困扰人类的疾病往往不易感染.

sentences.en: Famine and war still afflict mankind.
sentences.cn: 饥饿和战争仍使人类遭受痛苦.

sentences.en: For He does not afflict willingly Or grieve the sons of men.
sentences.cn: 哀3:33因他并不甘心使人受苦、人忧愁.

sentences.en: He will also afflict and weaken the Latin Church with many heresies.
sentences.cn: 他也会带着很多异教来折磨和异化拉丁教会.

sentences.en: I don't want to afflict you with my troubles.
sentences.cn: 我不想使你为我的困难而苦恼.

sentences.en: New medical technology will cure more ailments that afflict humanity.
sentences.cn: 新的医学技术可以治疗更多困扰人类的疾病.

sentences.en: Similar problems afflict working - class whites, but they are more concentrated among blacks.
sentences.cn: 同样的问题也影响到工薪阶层的白人, 但对黑人而言尤为突出.

sentences.en: The artistic temperament is a disease that afflict amateur.
sentences.cn: 艺术家脾气,是折磨业余爱好者的一种病.

sentences.en: The biggest problems in children's medicine concern diseases that afflict the poor.
sentences.cn: 目前儿童用药所针对的疾病都是让穷国苦不堪言的疾病.

sentences.en: Then she began to afflict him, and his strength left him.
sentences.cn: 于是大利拉克制他 、 他的力气就离开他了.

sentences.en: There are two main problems which afflict people with hearing impairments.
sentences.cn: 听力有障碍的人们主要受到两大问题的困扰。

sentences.en: Though I have afflicted thee, I afflict thee no more.
sentences.cn: 我的子民哪,我曾使你们受苦, 但我不再叫你们受苦了.

sentences.en: You shall not afflict any widow or fatherless child.

words.tran_cn: 难受的；苦恼的；给人痛苦的

trans.tran_en: to affect someone or something in an unpleasant way, and make them suffer
to affect someone or something in an unpleasant way, and make them suffer
